ModMetaData.name: SeedsPlease: Lite
ModMetaData.author: Owlchemist, CitizenKanye, Charlott
ModMetaData.description: This is a forked version of Charlotte's SeedsPlease mod. A single, universal bill replaces all the single extraction bills, seeds can be eaten by animals, new seed textures by CitizenKanye, and a number of other changes. For the original mod, see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=935732834
